ThingDef.label: animal heart (huge)
ThingDef.description: Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: animal kidney (huge)
ThingDef.description: Filters and removes waste products from the blood.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: animal liver (huge)
ThingDef.description: Plays an important role in metabolism.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: animal lung (huge)
ThingDef.description: Essential part of the respiratory system.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic animal leg (huge)
ThingDef.description: Simple prosthesis made to replace a missing leg. Not very comfortable but quite efficient.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic animal arm (huge)
ThingDef.description: Simple but durable arm prosthesis.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: bionic animal eye (huge)
ThingDef.description: Advanced piece of technology made not only to fully replace a natural eye, but also to give supernatural vision abilities.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: bionic animal ear (huge)
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ear implant. A collection of invisible subdermal microphones capture sound and transmit it to a biogel nerve interface that links directly with the auditory nerve. It's sensitive enough to hear a cat before you see it, can't be damaged by loud noise, and automatically tunes itself to pick out meaningful sounds in noisy environments.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: bionic animal leg (huge)
ThingDef.description: Bionic leg uses cutting-edge technology to give its owner extreme walking comfort and strength.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: bionic animal arm (huge)
ThingDef.description: One of the most sophisticated arm replacements. Gives extreme strength to its user.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of greater than 2.4.

ThingDef.label: animal painstopper (huge)
ThingDef.description: This brain implant will make an animal not feel pain.\n\nFits on animals with a mature body size of 0.7 or greater, but less than 1.3.
